title: Integration with existing givelight website
body: This is a big task, I think the first step would be to gather more concrete steps we can take.

title: Nice to have: on page error messages instead of window.alerts
Create a script that can do a live push in one step
body:
It should be able to set the correct live mongo DB password and then push to heroku. Maybe something like:
1. Ask for the live mongodb password as input
2. Set the password inside config/secret.json
3. run `git commit`
4. run `git push heroku master`
5. run `git reset HEAD~1`

title: Add prettier or other code formatter
body: A code formatter helps keep a consistent code style across the project. I've been using prettier and been happy with it: https://github.com/prettier/prettier. Other suggestions welcome.

title: Menu not displaying [BUG]
body: The left menu isn't displaying any information or reviewing any action

title: Fix db structure and indexing
body: get rid of volenteerInterests, make sure we are indexing the right columns and capturing all the data we need to.
